ModMetaData.name: RimCards (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Stokovski
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Stokovskis mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1951086368
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/RimCards][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Mechanoid Expansion here : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2036838446
[h1][b]RIMCARDS TO COLLECT ![/b][/h1]
Collect all the [b]RimCards[/b] and build the [b]RimCards Trophy[/b] to show off. Collect all [b]Shiny RimCards[/b] and build the [b]RimCards Shiny Trophy[/b] to show off even more.
There are [b]45 RimCards[/b] to collect !
[h2][b]LEGENDARY[/b][/h2] [list][*][b]Mighty Thrumbo[/b] [*][b]Fearless Megasloth[/b] [*][b]Cruel Megaspider[/b] [/list]
[h2][b]EPIC[/b][/h2] [list][*][b]Steady Muffalo[/b] [*][b]Clever Lynx[/b] [*][b]Feral Warg[/b] [*][b]Brave Arctic Wolf[/b] [*][b]Vicious Cobra[/b] [*][b]Massive Elephant[/b] [/list]
[h2][b]RARE[/b][/h2] [list][*][b]Gentle Caribou[/b] [*][b]Sleepy Musk Ox[/b] [*][b]Swift Panther[/b] [*][b]Unstable Boomalope[/b] [*][b]Funny Ostrich[/b] [*][b]Colorful Cassowary[/b] [*][b]Muscular Grizzly[/b] [*][b]Aggressive Ibex[/b] [*][b]Psycho Cat[/b] [*][b]Noble Rhinoceros[/b] [*][b]Lucky Monkey[/b] [*][b]Bipolar Polar Bear[/b] [/list]
[h2][b]COMMON[/b][/h2] [list][*][b]Peaceful Alpaca[/b] [*][b]Stupid Donkey[/b] [*][b]Friendly Horse[/b] [*][b]Sassy Chicken[/b] [*][b]Evil Yorkshire Terrier[/b] [*][b]Happy Human[/b] [*][b]Smart Fox[/b] [*][b]Reliable Camel[/b] [*][b]Gluttonous Pig[/b] [*][b]Inevitable Chinchilla[/b] [*][b]Independent Iguana[/b] [*][b]Hungry Alphabeaver[/b] [*][b]Calm Capybara[/b] [*][b]Kind Cow[/b] [*][b]Magnificent Deer[/b] [*][b]Random Elk[/b] [*][b]Energetic Hare[/b] [*][b]Emo Emu[/b] [*][b]Silent Fennec Fox[/b] [*][b]Lusty Gazelle[/b] [*][b]Elegant Husky[/b] [*][b]Helpful Labrador[/b] [*][b]Fat Turkey[/b] [*][b]Noisy Squirrel[/b] [/list]
You can disenchant [b]RimCards[/b] to get [b]RimCard Dust[/b] using the [b]Disenchanting RimCard Table.[/b]
You can craft RimCards with dust and other ingredients (depending on the card) using the [b]Crafting Rimcard Table.[/b]
You can buy them from a dedicated [b]RimCards Trader[/b].
All RimCards exist in a [b]Shiny Version[/b] that cost more to buy from the RimCards Trader.
-------------------
Let me know if there's a problem, spelling errors, or if you would like to see more [b]RimCards[/b] ! I'll regularly check.
[b]Hope you enjoy it. Stokovski.[/b]
My other mod here : [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1960216817[/url]
-------------------
Based on : [b]Fantastic Collectables[/b] by Spesscarp for RimCards and Trophies [b]Retro Joy[/b] by Chicken Plucker for the RimCard Playing Table
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2574106661][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/RimCards?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&color=9f1111&labelColor=black[/img][/url]
